trans-unit.source: A lean compiled templating system with support for i18n
trans-unit.target: i18n をサポートするリーンコンパイルされたテンプレートシステム

trans-unit.source: Curtain is a templating system akin to TAL, together
trans-unit.target: カーテンはTALに似たテンプレシステムで、一緒に

trans-unit.source: with the METAL and Zope’s i18n extensions. It’s compiled, based on SAX, and thought to read and produce always well-formed XML. The syntax and semantic is kept very simple, and strive to be 100% tested and documented as a development principle.
trans-unit.target: with the METAL and Zope’s i18n extensions. It’s compiled, based on SAX, and thought to read and produce always well-formed XML. The syntax and semantic is kept very simple, and strive to be 100% tested and documented as a development principle.
